CustomField.description: Used this field to lock the Opportunity Grid(Req:418)
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Completed'), ISPICKVAL( Sales_Outcome__c,'Cancelled by Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Lost to Competitor'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Withdrawn by Nokia'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Obsolete')
), 2,0 )
CustomField.label: Opportunity Lock
